name: 英文專題報導
restrict: ◎第一階段限 榮譽英語學程
description: 針對不同專題的英文報導，引導學生大量且深入的閱讀及評析，並透過專題的選取、框架、觀點與論述，以及報導型式與影像處理，製作英文專題報導節目。
goals: 強化學生英語文閱讀、聆聽的策略與能力，協助獲取專業領域新知
提昇英語文口語、寫作的表達能力，期盼學生能於工作職場及學術研究領域展現英語專業涵養。
協助學生深入瞭解國際社會的多元文化，培養國際觀，對特定文化現象進行分析、比較，激發學生之批判性思考能力。
syllabus:
**Objective**

To enhance students’ ability to understand and create topical articles and reports. This will be achieved through extensive reading, listening, viewing, detailed analysis and discussion. We will focus on:

  

1\. reading and listening skills

2\. the overall structure of articles and reports

3\. the structure of individual paragraphs

4\. appropriate word choice and collocations

5\. writing and presentation skills

  

**Schedule**

1\. Introduction and overview

2\. Extensive reading, listening and viewing

3\. The overall structure of reports

4\. The structure of paragraphs

5\. Word choice and collocations

6\. Television news reports

7\. Presentation skills

8\. Presentation topic choice and schedule

9\. Presentations

10\. Presentations

11\. Presentations

12\. Genre, opinion and bias

13\. Discussion and topic choice of written work

14\. The process of writing

15\. The process of writing

16\. Writing workshop

17\. Writing workshop

18\. Wrap-up

  

**Class Activities**

Lecturing

Reading, listening and viewing of topical reports

Discussion

Student presentations

Writing

  

**Evaluation**

Class attendance: 10% / Class participation: 30% / Presentations: 30% / Written work: 30%

  

**Course Materials**

Articles and reports selected by the instructor will be provided. Students will also be expected to self-select material for written reports and presentations.
